markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 23"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Coldstar Pistols](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2361)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 178 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dueling Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

One [dueling pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=201) in this paired set is etched with flames along its barrel, while the other is etched with icicles. In these separate forms, one gun comprising the _Coldstar Pistols_ functions as a _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) dueling pistol_ and the other as a _+3 greater striking [greater frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) dueling pistol_. When joined, the guns form a double-barreled weapon that functions as a _+4 major striking greater flaming greater frost dueling pistol_. The combined form has a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 120 feet. In either form, the Coldstar Pistols have the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), and [fatal d10 traits](/Traits.aspx?ID=178). As star guns, the _Coldstar Pistols_ run on magic and don't use ammunition or black powder.

<document level="2" id="action-1927" />

<document level="2" id="action-1928" />

**Destruction** If Deft Onki's name and deeds ever fade from mortal memory entirely, the _Coldstar Pistols_ can be destroyed like a normal object.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Coldstar Pistols

In these separate forms, one gun comprising the Coldstar Pistols functions as a +3 greater striking greater flaming dueling pistol and the other as a +3 greater striking greater frost dueling pistol . When joined, the guns form a double-barreled weapon that functions as a +4 major striking greater flaming greater frost dueling pistol . The combined form has a range increment of 120 feet. In either form, the Coldstar Pistols have the agile, concealable, concussive, and fatal d10 traits. As star guns, the Coldstar Pistols run on magic and don't use ammunition or black powder. Destruction If Deft Onki's name and deeds ever fade from mortal memory entirely, the Coldstar Pistols can be destroyed like a normal object.
